label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • ReworkedRanked All Pick. Before the picking phase begins, there is a 15 second voting phase to ban heroes. Each player votes for a different hero. Afterwards, half of the heroes that were voted on will be randomly selected and banned.

label: Bloodthorn
descriptionHtml: • New item formed fromOrchid,Crystalys, and a Recipe

label: Echo Sabre
descriptionHtml: • New item formed fromOblivion StaffandOgre Club

label: Blight Stone
descriptionHtml: • New item

label: Infused Raindrops
descriptionHtml: • New consumable item, Infused Raindrops

label: Wind Lace
descriptionHtml: • New item

label: Tome of Knowledge
descriptionHtml: • New consumable item

label: Hurricane Pike
descriptionHtml: • New item formed fromForce Staff,Dragon Lance, and a Recipe

label: Skull Basher
descriptionHtml:
• Bash damage reduced from 120 to 85
  • Recipe cost reduced from 1000 to 750

descriptionHtml: • Now requiresBasher,Vanguard, and a 1550 recipe

label: Armlet of Mordiggian
descriptionHtml: • Unholy Strengthnow grants 5 armor

label: Blade Mail
descriptionHtml:
• Now returns damage before any kind of reduction, and returns it in the same type as it was received
  • No longer ignores Spell Immune enemies

label: Butterfly
descriptionHtml: • Fluttercooldown reduced from 35 to 25

descriptionHtml: • Now requires Blight Stone instead of a 300 recipe

  • Mana burned by melee/ranged illusions reduced from 25/12 to 20/10

descriptionHtml: • Now requiresOgre Cluband 2xBand of Elvenskininstead of Ogre Club and Quarterstaff.

label: Ancient Apparition
descriptionHtml:

  • Cold Feet damage timing changed from 0.8/1.6/2.5/3.4 to 0/1/2/3

label: Arc Warden
descriptionHtml:
• Fluxno longer slows magic immune units
  • Flux is now purgeable
  • Flux slow reduced from 50% to 35/40/45/50%
  • Magnetic Fieldcooldown reduced from 50 to 35/30/25/20
  • Magnetic Field duration increased from 3.5/4/4.5/5 to 3.5/4.5/5.5/6.5
  • Magnetic Field now only evades attacks done from outside of the field
  • Spark Wraithmana cost reduced from 100/110/120/130 to constant 80
  • Spark Wraith activation delay reduced from 3 to 2
  • Spark Wraith now applies a 0.4/0.5/0.6/0.7 second purge
  • Spark Wraith damage rescaled from 150/200/250/300 to 100/160/220/280
  • Tempest Doubleno longer has an HP/Mana cost
  • Tempest Double ability/item cooldowns now persist on the unit
  • Tempest Double no longer replicates items that drop on death
  • Tempest Double cooldown reduced from 65/60/55 to 50/40/30
  • Tempest Double duration reduced from 20 to 12/13/14
  • Tempest Double cast point increased from 0 to 0.15
  • Strength growth increased from 1.9 to 2.3
  • Intelligence growth increased from 2.1 to 2.6

label: Axe
descriptionHtml:
• Counter Helixdamage type from Physical to Pure
  • Counter Helix damage reduced from 100/135/170/205 to 90/120/150/180

label: Bane
descriptionHtml: • Enfeeblemana cost reduced from 95/105/115/125 to 95

label: Beastmaster
descriptionHtml:
• Call of the Wild Hawk's day vision reduced from 700/1000/1300/1600 to 500/750/1000/1250
  • Call of the Wild Hawk's night vision reduced from 700/800/900/1000 to 500/650/800/950

  • Base strength reduced from 19 to 18
